main.name: Dorel Saig
main.occupation: B.Sc. Software Engineering Student, Specialize in Mobile Systems Development
main.description: Looking for my First Shot in making the Impossible by
main.jobDescription: shuffling some data, learning new Tech and pressing some keys until everything is up and running.
main.bio: I am an artist in my soul, fighter in my head and social in my heart. hard-successful working both team and self-directed settings. Quick-learner, Fully motivated and ready to EXPLORE
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

education.school: Afeka College of Engineering in Tel-Aviv
education.description: Here I took my Bachelors of Software Engineering with a Mobile Systems Specialty. In the course of my studies I've achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. I discovered my passion about mobile and software development
While making my way to the Matriculation Certificate I took major in Social Sciences, Computer Sciences and Visual Art

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I am fairly new to React and really did not like it at first. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it going forward. I have built a ReactJS based resume-website template (link below in portfolio) which I used as a starting point for this personal site.

skills.name: Node JS
skills.description: Node JS is my server-side scripting language of choice. The bulk of my experience with it has been in conjunction with MeteorJS-based projects

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: I have used many different database systems and am better educated and experienced with Relational Databases. However, for many applications, the ease of use of MongoDB better suits my needs and it is much more enjoyable to work with

testimonials.text: I have had the opportunity to work with Tim on multiple occasions which has always been a pleasure. He is driven and motivated with a consistently positive attitude. Tim excels at communicating with others and is always willing to work hard until he solves the problem at hand.
testimonials.user: Alastair Beaumont - Web Developer at AppColony
